title: Brainstorming Ideas
text:
Went from PRE-PRODUCTION all the way to POST-PRODUCTION
Nightmare Fuel: VTuber Rigging/Motion Capture - AI? Character Cloth Simulation - Cape! Fluid Simulations - Honey/Water - Good Research papers! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yX84nGi-V7E Rendering - Ray Tracing? Efficient VR rendering/lighting
Easy Mode: Project Management for production pipelines Create a re-usable repository of models Repository of models for boxing layouts Modelling Topology https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yX84nGi-V7E Procedurally Generated Texture https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VPI9xq41nOk
Ehhhhh: Efficient story boarding for production Character (Animal) Modelling UV unwrapping Textures Color Correction - Use old renders to see if they can be improved! Compositing - use a previous scene to compose elements into an image to improve rendering times?
